turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there! How can I help?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Hi. I'd like to order a espresso Starbucks beverage. Specifically, I would like a cafe americano.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, sure, which size did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a tall.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: A tall americano, got it. and did you have a starbucks location in mind?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I'm in Fort Lauderdale, Florida.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, let me see.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: HOw about the location on 2414 E Sunrise Blvd.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's good. That'll be fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great! did you want to add any sugars to your Americano?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I'd like to add some sugar, and also skim milk and whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Some sugar and skim milk. Unfortunately you cannot add whip cream to an americano.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, no problem. Skip the whip cream, then.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, got it!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So a tall Americano with some sugar and skim milk, correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: WOnderful. give me a moment to send it over to the location on Sunrise Blvd.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: My pleasure!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, your order has been sent to your desired location. It will be ready for pickup in 5-8 min.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, we'll be there.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: perfect!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Have a great day.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You too. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: thanks you !bye.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bye.
